rule: The part of speech tag should be one of the tags listed in the task: CC, CD, DT, EX, FW, IN, JJ, JJR, JJS, LS, MD, NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS, PDT, POS, PRP, PRP$, RB, RBR, RBS, RP, SYM, TO, UH, VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, VBZ, WDT, WP, WP$, WRB.
input: sentence: Because it is raining, we stayed inside., word: Because
complianceText:
The chatbot's task is to determine the part of speech for a given word and return just the tag for the word's part of speech. In this case, it should return only the part of speech tag such as 'CC' and not include the word itself or any additional text.
